CustomField.description: Identifies if more than 4 Yellow warnings in Q7-16
CustomField.formula:
IF( ( IF(ISPICKVAL(Q07_Services_Delivered__c, "Catering"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q07_Services_Delivered__c, "Pest"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q07_Services_Delivered__c, "Specialist/ Window cleaning"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q07_Services_Delivered__c, "Security Systems"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q08_TUPE_Employees__c, "More than 25"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q09_TUPE_Government_Pension_or_similar__c, "No"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q10_Liability_Capped_20m_level_required__c, "No"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q11_Payment_Terms_Under_30_Days__c, "No"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q12_CAPEX_200k__c, "Yes"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q13_Bond_Prebate_or_Liquidated_Damages__c, "Yes"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q14_Service_Credit_or_KPI_Risk_5_ACV__c, "Yes"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q15_Repair_Threshold_1k__c, "Yes"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Q16_Contract_Standard_Template_Terms__c, "Yes"),1,0) ) >=4
,true,false)
CustomField.label: Q7 - 16 Yellow
